root.name: Jack Keane
root.description: Jack Keane is a third person point and click adventure game developed by Deck13. The game follows Jack Keane, a ship captain, who needs money to pay off a debt and accepts a secret mission to ferry a British secret agent to a mysterious island called Tooth Island. You also play as Amanda, a bounty hunter sent to hunt Jack down by a nefarious scientist called Dr. T.Jack Keane is an adventure game in the vein of the Monkey Island games by having a sarcastic, self referential hero. In fact, it references Monkey Island in several locations and makes fun of itself being an adventure game. It uses a custom 3D engine and provides a handy feature that shows all interactive objects on screen by pressing the X key.System RequirementsPCMinimum:OS: Microsoft Windows XP, Windows VistaProcessor: Pentium IV 2 GHz / Athlon 2.4 GHzMemory: 512 MB RAMGraphics: DirectX 9.0c-compatible graphic card with 128 MB RAM (MX series and XGI Volari are not supported)Hard Drive: 1.5 GB hard-disk capacityInput Devices: DirectX 9.0c-compatible keyboard and mouseRecommended:OS: Microsoft Windows XP, Windows VistaProcessor: Intel-/AMD-CPU with 3.0 GHzMemory: 1 GB RAMGraphics: DirectX 9.0c-compatible graphic card with 256 MB RAMHard Drive: 1.5 GB hard-disk capacityInput Devices: DirectX 9.0c-compatible keyboard and mouse

similar_games.game: Tales of Monkey Island Chapter 1: Launch of the Screaming Narwhal
